sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
usually happens
, se največkrat zgodi v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: She usually found it easy to go to sleep at night.

sense.def:
Izraz
more than usually
pomeni, da nekaj kaže določeno lastnost v še večji meri kot običajno.

seg.quote: They had shown themselves to be more than usually gullible.
